sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-container fluid>
    <v-row align="center">
      <v-col cols="12" md="6">
        <v-autocomplete
          :items="participantUsers"
          small-chips
          clearable
          color="grey"
          label="参加者を追加"
          item-text="name"
          item-value="id"
          multiple
          :value="participantUser"
          @input="$emit('update:participantUser', $event)"
        >
        </v-autocomplete>
      </v-col>
    </v-row>
  </v-container>
</template>

<script>
import { mapActions, mapGetters } from 'vuex';

export default {
  name: 'GuestSelectForm',
  props: {
    value: {
      type: Array,
      required: true,
    },
    participantUsers: {
      type: Array,
      required: true,
    }
  },
  computed: {
    participantUser: {
      get() {
        return this.value;
      },
      set(newValue) {
        this.$emit('input', newValue);
      },
    },
    ...mapGetters('participants', ['participantUsers']),
  },
  created() {
    this.fetchParticipantUsers();
  },
  methods: {
    ...mapActions('participants', [
      'fetchParticipantUsers',
    ])
  },
};
</script>
